alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 05 at 3:36AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Florida, south central Florida and west central Florida, including the following counties, in central Florida, Hardee. In south central Florida, DeSoto. In west central Florida, Manatee. * WHEN...Until 645 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 336 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Limestone. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
